job_title: Work Study Student in San Antonio, TX
pros: You may be surprised of the opportunities to work in the administration that provide real-life knowledge. Take advantage of them,
cons: Work-study is still at a rate of 7.50 an hour. It takes a long time to finish your work-study hours, but if you care about the experience from the position, then I definitely you should stay for a while.
